author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police arrested a 49-year-old man on the charge of sexually abusing a five-year-old Dalit boy at Pethanayakkanpalayam near here on Saturday.

Police sources said that the boy studying Standard One at Panchayat Union School, Tirumalaisamuthiram, was returning from the school, when G. Ravi, who runs a vegetable stall at Fort Street, Pethanayakkanpalayam, took the boy inside his shop and sexually abused him.
title: Man held for sexually abusing boy
